intro: Psychotria hentyi, commonly known as the Henty's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in understory layers of rainforests. Psychotria hentyi is also noted for its medicinal properties, though it contains toxic alkaloids that require careful handling.
